headline: Citizens Financial Group, Inc. Declares Dividends on Preferred Stock
summary: PROVIDENCE, R.I., February 11, 2026--Citizens Financial Group, Inc. (NYSE: CFG) announced that its board of directors has declared the following dividends on its preferred stock payable on April 6, 2026, to preferred shareholders of record at the close of business on March 20, 2026:
